title: IMDB Clone

title: CourseSphere
description: Developed a full-stack e-learning platform with React.js and a Node.js/Express RESTful API, enabling secure user and admin authentication via JWT. Integrated third-party APIs,including Stripe for secure payments and Cloudinary for media storage, to handle key e-commerce and content management functionalities. Managed scalable user and course data using MongoDB Atlas, with a focus on optimizing database queries and building a responsive, dynamic user interface.

title: My Portfolio
description: Developed a refined and aesthetically pleasing portfolio with HTML, CSS, and React.js, thoughtfully structured to convey the breadth of my skills and depth of my experience. providing a comprehensive overview of my expertise and achievements.
